subject: Boxing
Officiating (Sports)
organizations: MGM Grand Garden Arena (Las Vegas, Nev)
lead_paragraph: The much-hyped superfight displayed vintage Floyd Mayweather tactics, as the undefeated champion kept Manny Pacquiao from connecting on many punches.
snippet: The much-hyped superfight displayed vintage Floyd Mayweather tactics, as the undefeated champion kept Manny Pacquiao from connecting on many punches.
